extension.description: This repo supports the Odroid_C2 aarch64 device only, don't install this on other platforms than linux/aarch64. Use this, on other AML S905 aarch64 based devices, at your own risk! We are not responsible for any damage, data loss or system instability!
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addons may not be legal in your country of residence, please check with your local laws before installing.
